# penguin_jwt (Data Source)

Issue a JWT via `POST /auth/jwt`. Requires the provider `auth_token` (legacy bearer token).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "penguin_jwt" "example" {
  ttl_minutes = 60
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ttl_minutes` (Number)

### Optional

- `allowed_instance_types` (List of String)
- `allowed_zones` (List of String)
- `max_bandwidth_mbps` (Number)
- `max_transfer_kb` (Number)
- `project_id` (Number)

### Read-Only

- `expires_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
